GPT-4.1 and GPT-4.1 mini underwent our standard safety evaluations. Detailed results are available in the newly launched Safety Evaluations Hub.

https://t.co/c8NgmXlC2Y

Plus, Pro, & Team users will be able to access GPT-4.1 via the "more models" dropdown in the model picker. Enterprise & Edu users will get access in the coming weeks.

We’re also introducing GPT-4.1 mini, replacing GPT-4o mini, in ChatGPT for all users.

https://t.co/Hiievyk7BT

By popular request, GPT-4.1 will be available directly in ChatGPT starting today.

GPT-4.1 is a specialized model that excels at coding tasks & instruction following. Because it’s faster, it’s a great alternative to OpenAI o3 & o4-mini for everyday coding needs.

Introducing the Safety Evaluations Hub—a resource to explore safety results for our models.

While system cards share safety metrics at launch, the Hub will be updated periodically as part of our efforts to communicate proactively about safety.
https://t.co/c8NgmXlC2Y

linkedin.text:
🚀 OpenAI
🌐 Website: https://openai.com
📍 HQ: San Francisco, California, United States
🗓️ Founded: 2015

💰 Recent Funding: $6.6B Venture Round
🤝 Investors: Thrive Capital, Microsoft, Nvidia, SoftBank, Khosla Ventures, Altimeter Capital, Fidelity, MGX

📖 OpenAI is a leading artificial intelligence research company developing and deploying advanced AI models, such as ChatGPT. Their focus is on creating beneficial AI and making it accessible to a broad audience. OpenAI's unique value proposition lies in its cutting-edge research and the development of powerful and widely used AI tools.

#startupfunding #startups #venturecapital #Artificial #Intelligence

Ever wondered how OpenAI maintains lightning-fast product velocity while scaling exponentially?

The answer is quite counterintuitive: They don't scale teams. They multiply them.

OpenAI's strategy? Deliberately keeping teams small and nimble. These focused units operate with startup-like agility, making decisions quickly and shipping innovations at a pace that would be impossible with traditional organizational structures.
While most tech giants slow down as they grow, crushed under the weight of bureaucracy and approval chains.

The lesson? Sometimes the path to doing more isn't adding more people to one team—it's creating more teams that can move independently.

What do you think? Is your organization structured for velocity or comfort?

#ProductDevelopment #OrganizationalStrategy #Innovation

“From ‘Don’t Google Your Symptoms’ to ‘A GPT a Day Keeps the Doctor Away’?”

That shift might not be far off.

OpenAI is pushing into healthcare with serious intent.

Their latest move: HealthBench, a rigorous test built with 262 doctors across 60 countries, using 5,000 real-life patient conversations.

Why does it matter?

- GPT-4.1 nano (a compact model) outperformed bigger, costlier AI models including previous versions of GPT-4 and rivals like Claude and Gemini
- It aced clinical reasoning tests
- It’s 25x cheaper but smarter in health conversations

OpenAI is now hiring health AI engineers.
They aren’t experimenting, they’re building.

Of course, doctors won’t be replaced.
But your first consultation? That might just be with #AI .

Are we ready for that change?

And as #healthcare professionals, are we adapting fast enough?

Hello Tech Champs!
  
 We have excellent openings in one of our top client,
Job Title : Data Scientist
Location: Remote
Hire Type: Contract
Mandatory Skills : SQL , Python, NLP and Pandas NumPy.
 
Job Description:
Analyze large datasets using SQL and Python.
Develop ML and deep learning models.
Apply NLP techniques to text data.
Implement OpenAI technologies (preferred).
Collaborate with teams to deliver data-driven solutions.
Communicate insights through reports and visualizations.
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related (Master’s/PhD preferred).
Proficient in SQL, Python, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn.
Experience with TensorFlow, Keras, or PyTorch.
Solid understanding of NLP and libraries like NLTK, spaCy, Transformers.
Strong problem-solving, communication, and multitasking skills.
OpenAI experience is a plus.


Ready to make an impact? Send your updated resume to ayisha@thepermatech.com📩
  
💡Know someone who’s a perfect fit? Tag them & share the opportunity! Let’s help each other grow. 🌱

🚀 Just Built My First Autonomous AI Agent Using n8n + OpenAI + SerpAPI! 🤖✨
Super excited to share that I’ve finally created an end-to-end AI Agent workflow using n8n — and it’s working beautifully!

 Here’s what this mini-agent can do 👇
💡 How It Works:
 🔹 Listens to chat messages in real-time
 🔹 Uses OpenAI to generate smart, human-like answers
 🔹 Taps into SerpAPI for real-time web search data
 🔹 Stores context via Simple Memory to keep conversations meaningful

All of this — stitched together visually with n8n’s no-code/low-code interface.
 And yes, it has a public UI, so others can try it too with just a click! 🧩

This was my first step into the world of AI automations and agents — and there’s so much more to explore!

#AIagent #n8n #OpenAI #SerpAPI #Automation #NoCode #GenerativeAI #AIworkflow #BuildInPublic #FirstBuild

My “basic” ChatGPT account just flexed harder than I expected.
Today I attended a session by OpenAI for Nonprofits Sprint, and let’s just say — ChatGPT isn’t just about writing poems or fixing code typos anymore.

Turns out this “chatbot” has a few superpowers:

🔹Custom GPTs
🔹Canvas 
🔹Deep Research 
🔹Projects

And the best part?
It was designed for people with zero coding background… and yet even as someone from tech, I walked away with mind-blown energy and 10 new use cases I hadn’t thought of.

Always here for tools that make work smarter, not harder.

Thanks to OpenAI  and the amazing team Alex Nawar , Lauren Oliphant , Rich Leimsider.
Let’s keep learning and building — with AI and empathy.

#AIForGood #ChatGPT #OpenAI #TechWithPurpose

Everyone believes the whale belongs in the ocean.
I placed it in the desert.

This isn’t about AI.
It’s about perspective.

Tool: Sora by OpenAI
Prompt: A surreal whale drifting across the desert — majestic, misplaced, intentional.
Concept: Contrast between life and lifelessness. Stillness versus motion. Nature reimagined.
Why? To break visual habits. To turn expectations into questions.
Creative Role: Vision creator | Prompt architect | Storyboard thinker
Outcome: A frame that stops you. Makes you feel. Makes you wonder.

I don’t just use AI to create images.
I use it to challenge what’s supposed to be seen.

Because imagination doesn't follow rules — it rewrites them.

#Sora #AIArt #CreativeThinking #VisualDirection #ConceptDesign #AIxCreativity #NewRealities #HumanDrivenAI
Wow this is gold for anyone who wants to learn AI

🔮 The revolution isn’t coming. It’s already happening.

🛒 Very soon, ChatGPT won’t just help you find a product; it will sell it to you.

⚡ OpenAI is integrating Shopify’s checkout directly into ChatGPT.
No new tabs, no redirects, no friction: you’ll chat, discover, and purchase; all within the same conversation.

🌍 What does this change? Everything!

🖥️ Traditional websites become accessories.
🛤️ The classic sales funnel starts to disappear.
💬 The real shopping experience happens where the customer already is: inside the conversation.

📈 For millions of small and medium-sized businesses, this is a game-changer.
Instead of fighting to bring users to their storefronts, the storefront will come to the user, seamlessly embedded into the flow of interaction.

🚀 This is not just an update.
It’s a glimpse into the future of commerce, software, and customer experience.

💥 Those who move now will thrive.
⏳ Those who wait will be left behind.

👀 Are you ready?

How does OpenAI turn ideas into global products faster than anyone else? 

It's not magic it's an 8-Step System that your team can adopt. 

From laser-focused planning to rapid deployment, Thier method balances creativity and efficiency. 

Key principles include:

1. Define Your North Star. 
2. Rapid Prototyping for real-world feedback. 
3. Iterative testing that drives improvement.
4. Collaborative execution across teams. 

Each step is designed to ensure that innovation meets market needs swiftly. 

Want to launch products like a pro? Steal these strategies and adapt them for your team

Job update: after 7 years with Apple's employment law team, I'm starting a new adventure and have joined Anthropic as their second employment lawyer! 

For anyone unfamiliar, Anthropic is an AI safety and research company deeply committed to building frontier AI that is helpful, honest, and harmless. If you haven't met the amazing Claude already, allow me to introduce you: https://claude.ai/

To my phenomenal managers, teammates, and partners at Apple - you know who you are - thank you for everything. ❤️ 

To my new Anthropic colleagues: let's do this! 🚀

🤖✨ Imagine an AI that doesn’t just know things it learns what's happening right now.
That’s exactly what Anthropic is delivering with the launch of its Web Search API for Claude AI 🚀 👇 


#Indianic IndiaNIC Infotech Limited #Anthropic #ClaudeAI #Claude3 #AItools #WebSearchAPI #Developers #LLMs #MachineLearning #TechUpdate #ClaudeCode #RealtimeAI #GenerativeAI #AITools #FutureOfAI #APIs

Dario Amodei, CEO of Anthropic issues a clear call to action in his latest essay: model-level interpretability is urgent—and should be a top priority for all foundation model companies...OpenAI, Google DeepMind, Cohere and others.

But enterprises aren’t waiting. They’re deploying AI systems now—and they need transparency across every decision, escalation, and override.

Here’s how Netomi is operationalizing AI Interpretability at the system level inside the Fortune 500.

Read the full post below...

I’m happy to share that I’ve started a new position as Member of Technical Staff at Anthropic! Getting the band back together with Amanda Donohue, Ryan Bergauer, Lisa Cohen, Sambavi Muthukrishnan, and meeting so many incredible Ants. 🐜 

Anthropic is a mission-driven research lab building Artificial Intelligence (Claude) which is helpful, harmless, and honest. If this is something you are passionate about, come join us! http://anthropic.com/jobs

🚨 New course on MCP with Anthropic! 

In many LLM applications today, connecting to tools or external data sources still means writing custom logic for each integration. As more teams build with AI, this approach is slow and fragmented.

The Model Context Protocol (MCP), developed by Anthropic, addresses this problem by introducing a shared standard. MCP defines how LLM applications can access tools, data, and prompts using a client-server architecture, making integrations easier to build, reuse, and maintain.

To help you understand and apply this emerging protocol, we’ve created the course “MCP: Build Rich-Context AI Apps with Anthropic,” taught by Elie Schoppik.

You’ll learn how MCP works under the hood, how to build your own server, and how to connect it to Claude-powered applications locally or remotely.

🔗 Enroll now! https://hubs.la/Q03mtYxW0

ANTHROPIC Claude Code's lead engineer claims that "80-90%" of the AI app's own code is produced by Claude itself ✨ 

This contrasts with Google's Sundar Pichai on the topic 4 months ago (see comments):

"Humans are writing the code. The AI systems are suggesting completions. And, you know, 25% of the code that's checked in, you know, involves people accepting those suggestions - right, so. 

But you're still away, far away from - in a pure way - you can describe a problem and the AI writing the code, or something like that."

How close to reality are these numbers? 

Why are they so much higher for Anthropic and all these "Series A" portfolio companies, in your view?

#ai #genai #coding #anthropic #claude

🚀 Just published my new LinkedIn article on Building Effective AI Agents!
I've distilled key insights from Anthropic's Barry Zhang on how to move beyond the hype and create truly practical #AIAgents. Discover core principles for:
Knowing WHEN to build an agent
Keeping agent architecture SIMPLE
Thinking like your agent for better performance
If you're working with #AI and #LLM, this is for you! 

#AgentEngineering #Anthropic #ArtificialIntelligence #Tech

AI Agents: OpenAI vs. Anthropic


Amid the market hype, posturing, and noise, there’s often a lack of consensus on what AI agents are, when to use them, or how to design them effectively.

Here are two perspectives well worth your time:

1\ OpenAI’s 'A practical guide to building agents' backed by:

→ 34% share of the foundation model market.
→ 300 of it's most promising implementations.
→ Over 2 million business users.

2\ Anthropic’s 'Building effective agents' backed by:

→ 24% share of the foundation model market.
→ Experience working with dozens of teams building LLM agents across industries.

I've created a graphic below highlighting key points for you to save. To fully grasp the nuances, both papers are also linked in the comments.

P.S. What are your thoughts on OpenAI and Anthropic's approaches?

Hello everyone 👋!!
Welcome to a new edition of InsighTech Digest. 
Today, I bring you the latest breakthroughs in the world of artificial intelligence. We start with OpenAI, which launches HealthBench, a new standard for evaluating AI in healthcare. Then, FaceAge, a system that shows how visible biological age can predict cancer progression. In parallel, Bloomberg exposes how some U.S. counties are financially dependent on ICE detention centers. Later, Microsoft unveils DxGPT, an AI tool designed to support the diagnosis of rare diseases. Additionally, Harvard plans to sell one billion dollars in private equity stakes due to rising political tensions. Meanwhile, Trump faces six international fronts with no clear victories. We wrap up with Anthropic, which warns about the imminent integration of virtual employees with real access to critical systems.
📢Let's get to it! 🚀
